about_the_game:
Experience a selection of music from Prehistoric Kingdom with the first volume of our soundtrack, composed by Byron McKay!

Ranging from dino-sized orchestral soundscapes to introspective instrumentals, take a walk in the park and enjoy 30 minutes of music from Prehistoric Kingdom. Features 15 tracks (including 4 bonus biome medleys), updated arrangements of popular pieces and live woodwinds performed by Joe Di Fiore on the latter half of the soundtrack.

Credits
  • Music written by Byron McKay
  • Orchestration by Byron McKay and Evan Rogers
  • Mixing by Adam Miller
  • Album artwork by Ida Kalsta

Performance
  • Live woodwinds performed by Joe Di Fiore

How To Access The Music

  • The album MUST BE DOWNLOADED from your Steam Library with the Soundtracks filter enabled.
  • Then, it can be accessed locally via the folder downloaded to "\Steam\steamapps\common\Prehistoric Kingdom OST".

name: Prehistoric Kingdom: Soundtrack, Vol. 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 38 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 438 MB available space

short_description: Take a walk in the park and experience a selection of Prehistoric Kingdom's music with the first soundtrack volume.
